wikipedia_page.main: Terence Dillon (born 8 May 1964) is a male retired British rower. Dillon competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics and the 1992 Summer Olympics. He represented England and won a silver medal in the eight, at the 1986 Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh, Scotland. He competed for Great Britain in the 1993 World Championships.
